resources.string: VIOMI Smart Instant Heating Water Dispenser (MINI)
Failed to get data, please check the network connection
Warm tip: Lower TDS , fewer impurities in water.
Warm tip: There is lot of impurity please change the water in time.
water is fresh and remember to share frequently~
you have kept the water for %1$d hours and need to drink in time
the existing water is still available for drinking while change to fresh water is more healthy for the body
Suggest to change to fresh water when the existing for a long time~
no need to clean currently and pls keep it~
Pls use citric acid to clean as you have 60 days without cleaning
No 1, Pls check whether choose heating or boiling button;
No 2, Remove the plug and reconnect the power ;
No 3, If the fault is still existed after following the above procedures pls call VIOMI service center call 400–100–2632 and the professional guy will help you to solve the problem.
No 1, Check whether there is water in the tank and then press “water outlet button” for seconds to make the inlet water NTC completely touched with water;

No 2, Pls check whether it’s because of the low water temperature to make freezing and pls put out the freezing water and make sure the room temperature is above 5° and use it after two hours which can make inlet water NTC completely touched with the water;
No 3, If the fault is still existed after following the above procedures pls call VIOMI service center call 400–100–2632 and the professional guy will help you to solve the problem.

No 1, Pls check whether it’s because of the low water temperature to make freezing and pls put out the freezing water and make sure the room temperature is above 5° and use it after two hours which can make inlet water NTC completely touched with the water;
No 2, If the fault is still existed after following the above procedures pls call VIOMI service center call 400–100–2632 and the professional guy will help you to solve the problem.

No 1, Pls check whether it’s because of the low water temperature to make freezing and pls put out the freezing water and make sure the room temperature is above 5° and use it after two hours which can make inlet water NTC completely touched with the water;
No 2, If the fault is still existed after following the above procedures pls call VIOMI service center call 400–100–2632 and the professional guy will help you to solve the problem.
The higher water temperature in the tank means the lowest adjustable temperature is higher.
